name: The Long Tutorial
description:
You are an AI in a government facility being trained for combat. All is according to plan, you will begin to train, no glitches in the simulator, and you are ready.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump:Space

Shoot: Left-Click

Grapple: Right-Click

Main Menu- Escape Key

Crouch - Q
